verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a joy deep down,
That's in my heart today,
There's a joy deep down,
That's in my heart to stay,
For the Lord has redeemed Israel
And set her free again,
Oh there's a joy deep down
That's in my heart to stay.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All the trees clap their hands,
And the mountains sing their praise,
Let the fields rejoice,
And streams break forth in praise,
For the Lord has redeemed Israel,
And set her free again,
Oh there's a joy deep down,
That's in my heart to stay.
